TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {89979=* The latest Porsche models are designed to operate on fuels with an ethanol content of up to 10%. The figures do not refer to an individual vehicle nor do they constitute part of the offer. They are intended solely as a means of comparing different types of vehicle. You can obtain further information about individual vehicles from your Porsche Centre. Consumption figures were obtained on the basis of standard equipment.
